ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who invent lies against Allah are not successful - a brief enjoyment, then they will have a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For them there is some enjoyment, but the punishment is painful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Brief is their enjoyment of the world, and thereafter they shall suffer a painful chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Such an invention) will bring only a little enjoyment but will be followed by painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A little enjoyment – and for them is a punishment, most painful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A passing brief enjoyment (will be theirs), but they will suffer a painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A little enjoyment and they shall have a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: A little enjoyment, then for them awaits a painful chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A brief enjoyment (will be theirs); and theirs a painful doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: their enjoyment of this life is brief, and they shall have a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A brief enioyment, and unto them shall be a torment afflictive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [Their share of the present life is] a trifling enjoyment, and there will be a painful punishment for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (In such falsehood) is but a paltry profit; but they will have a most grievous Penalty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: A passing brief enjoyment (will be theirs), but they will have a painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Brief (is their) enjoyment, after which a painful punishment awaits them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: A brief enjoyment—then they will have a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It is but] a brief enjoyment, and they will have a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:117] For them [there will be], a brief enjoyment, in this world, and for them, in the Hereafter, there will be a painful chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A brief enjoyment (will be theirs)) they will abide in this worldly life but for a short period; (and theirs a painful doom) in the Hereafter.
